7PI.F.summary: Poste Italiane SpA provides postal, logistics, and financial and insurance products and services in Italy. It operates in four segments: Mail, Parcels and Distribution; Payments, Mobile and Digital; Financial Services; and Insurance Services. The Mail, Parcels and Distribution segment offers letter post, express delivery, logistics, parcels, and philately services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated a network of 12,765 post offices in Italy. The Payments, Mobile and Digital segment provides payment services, card payments, and mobile telecommunications services, as well as digital services for the public sector. The Financial Services segment is involved in the collection of various forms of savings deposits; provision of payment and foreign currency exchange services, as well as investment services; and promotion and arrangement of loans issued by banks and other authorized financial institutions. The Insurance Services segment offers life and casualty insurance products. Poste Italiane SpA was founded in 1862 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy.

B2AA.F.summary: Bioera S.p.A. engages in the production and sale of organic products, natural cosmetics, and traditional food products in Italy. The company markets its products under the KI, Crudigno, and Fonte della Vita brand names. Bioera S.p.A. distributes its products through outsourcers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Milan, Italy.

BIE.MI.summary: Bioera S.p.A. engages in the production and sale of organic products, natural cosmetics, and traditional food products in Italy. The company markets its products under the KI, Crudigno, and Fonte della Vita brand names. Bioera S.p.A. distributes its products through outsourcers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Milan, Italy.

GPI.MI.summary: GPI SpA provides ICT healthcare solutions for various public and private sector in Italy and internationally. Its products and services portfolio includes information systems and hi-tech platform for healthcare services, automated warehouse system for hospital and pharmacies, telemedicine and virtual care, DTM services, and e-payment solutions. It develops an EHR platform for diagnosis and treatment; clinical collaboration platform that enables clinicians to share patient information, such as reports, images, and structured data; IT solution for the management of various processes of neonatal intensive care unit, such as medical treatment, assistance, and information exchange between medical staff and parents; and a modular hospital information system to manage various clinical activities in private and public hospitals. The company also offers solutions for automated drug storage and picking system; a virtual care solution for patients', doctors, and healthcare operators; and Phebo, a platform for H2T evaluation of biometrics observations for tele-monitoring, virtual care, and telemedicine activities. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Trento, Italy.
